text: Are we supposed to get acquainted with the organization community, do some background work (like reading papers, exploring the codebase) during the community bonding period for GSoC? If someone could rope in and give their comments what they did if they were a part of any previous season?

elements.text: Are we supposed to get acquainted with the organization community, do some background work (like reading papers, exploring the codebase) during the community bonding period for GSoC? If someone could rope in and give their comments what they did if they were a part of any previous season?

text:
In my case, I was already acquainted with the community so I have used that time to get an head start on the project.
There is no pressure to do that though, you can use that time to setup your workflow and do some more research on what you will be implementing :slightly_smiling_face:
